name: tubal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
anatomy, medical
  specialized in, relating to, or involving one of the fallopian tubes in the human body: Female infertility could have many causes, including pelvic scarring, tubal blockage, or endometriosis. We compared two methods of tubal sterilization.
formal using a tube or in the form of a tube: The family had opposed applications from the doctors for permission to withdraw tubal feeding (= putting liquid food directly into someone's body using a tube). He invented a slender tubal telescope lens, which he used to look inside his patients' knees. The epididymis is the tubal structure that carries sperm from the testicle.
More examplesFewer examplesTubal scarring can lead to infertility or ectopic pregnancy.This is a radiodiagnostic technique that is used to detect uterine and tubal pathologies.The patient did not conceive despite regular ovulatory cycles and diagnostic laparoscopy revealed bilateral tubal adhesions.The embryos were then washed and cultured in human tubal fluid.
